First Robotics Team 360.description: As General Manager, I led alongside industry mentors, providing an invaluable experience for team success and personal growth. The team allowed me to explore my potential and understand that boundaries are sometimes self-imposed. I quickly learned that robotics was more than just the robot. On one level, it encouraged collaboration with different people. While on another, it gave me an opportunity to work with both my hands and mind. The idea of “learning by doing” immediately connected with me. I enjoyed pursuing solutions to our daily challenges with the team by my side.
